revisionDesc.change: removed final page break, which was for Bucke note, not LVVW content
Silent Proofreading Correctios and Miller date note
Proofreading Corrections: Heyde dates and Silent Proof
Clean encoding (editor, date, remove "_large") and add standard annotations on unannotated files (Jeff W, Martha [Mattie], George W, Lou Haslam)
Encode regularization of contractions, days of week, and frequently misspelled words

body.p:
i received your letter yesterday we got the papers you send walterWalter dear i am glad you gain a little the weather here is very disagreable disagreeable dark and dreary just so i feel at times dark and dreary i suppose every body has theire their good feelings and bad ones) i have been writing to Jeff and speaking about mattyMatty makes me always feel so down hearted she was so good to me i cant can't never get reconciled to her loss never shall i find her kindness from daughter or daughter inlawdaughter-in-law but she s she's gone poor soul i was glad you got a letter from Jeff
i wish he would write to me i suppose he is very busy with his extra work georgeGeorge too is on seems to be full of business mrMr. Lane has empowered him to oversee his work at florence Florence and glowcesterGloucester
so i dont don't think georgeGeorge will suffer for the want of employment if he dident didn't get the brooklyn Brooklyn work starrStarr dident didn't put in a bill for the brooklyn Brooklyn work so its done away at eastonEaston

Lou s Lou's aunt is here has been here sometime and will stay i suppose somtime some time louLou likes to have her here very much i suppose so we drift along walterWalter dear some is wanted and some aint ain't but we shall all get to our final resting place some day)

closer.salute: we will all hope for the best

postscript.p: this aint ain't a very cheerfull cheerful letter i dont don't feel much like writing a good letter so dont don't send this to han (i am pretty well
write as often as you can dear waltWalt
